Backgroundizer offers three exciting features to enhance your web browsing experience. With the ability to change the background color of a webpage, you can customize the look and feel of your favorite websites. The webpage rotate feature allows you to view a page from a different angle, adding a new level of interactivity to your browsing. Lastly, the 3D viewer feature offers a unique way to view a webpage, giving it a new dimension and making your browsing experience more dynamic and engaging.

Whether you want to personalize your browsing experience, or just want to add a touch of fun, this Chrome extension is a must-have. Its easy-to-use interface and powerful features make it the perfect tool for anyone who loves the web. So why wait? Install it today and start exploring the internet in a whole new way!
